page.title: 17A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: At{6.45am}I rise and go outside to the shed to{milk}the{goats.}When I return at{7.30am}I have{breakfast consisting of{bran flakes}and a cup of {coffee.}I then ready myself for school and leave at{8.45am.}We then play on the playground at school until{9.00 when we go inside. We do several subjects-{maths,english {R.E.,Art and craft-}before having a{15 {minute break}at{10.40am.}We then work until{dinner break}at{12.00,}lasting for an hour.At{2.30 pm}we have{P.E. before leaving school at{3.15pm.}On arrival at home I change into some old clothes and{milk}the{goats,}help my mother with the{sheep,}and call in the {horses.}We then{play}or{watch}the {television}until{9.00pm}when I retire to bed.
